args.natural_language_statement: Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences with a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, lim a_n = a, lim b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Set Filter TopologicalSpace MeasureTheory Function
open scoped Topology Interval Filter ENNReal MeasureTheory
open MeasureTheory

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences with a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, lim a_n = a, lim b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem integrableOn_Icc_of_intervalInteg

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù and sequences a_n, b_n with a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, a_n ‚Üí a, b_n ‚Üí b.
    Suppose f is integrable on each [a_n, b_n]. Then f is integrable on [a,b] and the integrals converge:
    ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem integral_of_limits_of_intervals {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} {a_n b_n : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (h_between : ‚àÄ n, a < a_n n ‚àß a_n n < b_n n ‚àß b_n n < b)
  (h_an : Tendsto a_n atTop (ùìù a))
  (h_bn : Tendsto b_n atTop (ùìù b))
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a_n n) (b_n n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Tendsto (Œª n, ‚à´ x in a_n n .. b_n n, f x) atTop (ùìù (‚à´ x in a..b, f x)) := by sorry
